summary: The Uruk-Hai shield from the Lord of the Rings movies.
descriptionHtml:
Shield is done and works ingame :D

what more is there to say...

if some one could make an epic fatality kill animation with it.... it would be perfect!

The shield is purchasable from Eourlund in Whiterun, or craft it yourself
model and texture done by me
Thanks to Phate3 who put it in-game

I recommend blackrose86\'s \"punching shield bash animation\"  
It gives the 2 spikes on the shield a deadly purpose!
check it out!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25748
Thanks to him for this awesome addition!
author: mandarinn
